column2: The Logical Resource Name - commonly set by parent stack
can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, dashes and underscores.
[{u'PolicyName': u'root', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'cloudformation:DescribeStackResource', u's3:GetObject'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]

[{u'ToPort': u'22', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'192.168.0.0/16', u'FromPort': u'22'}, {u'ToPort': u'80', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'192.168.0.0/16', u'FromPort': u'80'}, {u'ToPort': u'4000', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'192.168.0.0/16', u'FromPort': u'4000'}]
Enable SSH access via port 22, and HTTP access via 80 & 4000
VpcId of your existing Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances (use bastion KeyPair if available)
SubnetId of an existing Private subnet in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
